(26) 1)COPY NO : '^"0C A 3 I H E T.IMPERIAL CONFER1926.DCCULENTS C0I.;,.Tr,.'TEEIn accordance Tilth Cabinet Conclusion 14 (26) 6, and with the practice adopted in the case of previous Imperial Conferences, the Prime Minister desires that a Committee, composed as followsThe Lord Privy Seal (In the Chair).The Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs.The Chancellor of the Exchequer.The Secretary of State for the colonies and Dominion Affairs. The Secretary of State for War. The Secretary of State for Indiae The Secretary of State for Air, The First Dordof the Adniir&lty. The President of the Bo^rd of Trade. should meet for the purpose of considering the documents which have been crepe red by the Inter-Departmental Sub-Committees as suitable for circulation to the Dominions in connection with the forthcoming session, of the Im-oerial Conference.(Signed)I'..
